getRole.title: Change Your Flavor Role
getRole.description: Click the button below to grab a role representing your favourite Dew!

selectColour.title: Select a colour
selectColour.description: Which colour is the Mountain Dew you want to pick?
selectColour.invalidColourDescription:
The colour you selected is invalid.
Please try again later, or select a different Dew colour.

selectFlavour.title: Select a Dew flavour
selectFlavour.description: Which Mountain Dew flavour do you want?

selfAssignRoles.title: Assign Your Own Roles
selfAssignRoles.aboutDescription:
This channel will allow you to select from a variety of optional roles. Please select only the ones that apply to you.
Clicking a role button will either give/remove the role to/from you, depending on if you already have it.
selfAssignRoles.section1Description:
***Dew Insider*** will notify you about the latest DEW News as soon as it hits.
***Dew Market Insider*** will notify you about changes made to #dew-market.

• Dew Collector
• Dew Mixologist
• Dew Insider
• Dew Market Insider
selfAssignRoles.section2Description:
• He/Him
• She/Her
• They/Them
• Other (Ask for my pronouns!)
selfAssignRoles.section5Description:
*Represent your favorite holiday MTN DEW flavor with its respective team role.*
*Team topic will refresh in early January 2022.*
• Team Holiday Brew (Original DEW + Code Red; 2017)
• Team Merry Mash-Up (Cranberry Pomegranate; 2018-2020)
• Team Gingerbread Snap'd (Take a Wild Guess; 2021)

randomMessages: I could beat Bro Crab in a fight
